body:
Hello @TomAugspurger! Thanks for submitting the PR.

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/plotting/test_datetimelike.py`](https://github.com/TomAugspurger/pandas/blob/b34b933183751dd5f55fff73168bd7b1262ca98a/pandas/tests/plotting/test_datetimelike.py) !

@datapythonista
